about_the_game:
Legend of Parry King is an action-packed boss-rush game inspired by the combat of Sekiro. Explore the beautiful eastern lands and face off against corrupted demons, defeating them through skillful parrying and dodging, without causing them harm.



Step into the shoes of a true parry master in The Legend of Parry King, where winning isn’t about inflicting harm, but outmaneuvering your opponent.

Gameplay Highlights:

Dispel the Demon Mist:
Every successful parry or dodge reduces the "demon power" of your opponent. Reduce it to zero, and they will no longer be aggressive.

Harm No One:
Travel through the beautiful landscapes of the East, subduing rampaging demons along the way without harming them, to stop the Attack Demon, spreading its deadly poison across the land.

The Art of Parrying:
Demons have a variety of attacks. To dodge correctly, you must recognize the attack patterns and how to parry or dodge them. Timing and reflexes are essential!




Become a legend by mastering these moves and neutralizing your foes with finesse in Legend of Parry King!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1024MB RAM and Webgl enabled
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
